summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Illinois Estate Law Staff Portal. Core functionality (auth, dashboard, navigation) works well, but form submissions have Airtable integration issues due to field name mismatches and permission problems.

critical_bugs.impact: Add Case Contact form fails silently

permission_issues.issue: Returns 403 - Invalid permissions or model not found
permission_issues.impact: Payments page shows error, no payment data loads

permission_issues.issue: Returns 403 - Invalid permissions or model not found
Returns 403 - Invalid permissions or model not found

ui_bugs.issue: No success/error messages shown to users after form submission

integration_issues.issue: Forms submit but fail silently due to backend 422 errors

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with search, stats, consultations, deadlines
Sidebar navigation and all action items accessible
Phone intake page loads with Tally form embed
Payments page UI loads (data fails due to permissions)
Master List and Dashboard data APIs work
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Airtable field name mismatches in backend API endpoints. The backend is using field names like 'Recipient', 'Title', 'Role', 'Matter', 'Email' but Airtable schema expects different field names. Also resolve Airtable permissions for Payments, Invoice, and Case Tasks tables. Add proper success/error message handling in frontend forms.
